quote: Football is not just a game. It's a way of life.
author: Pele

quote: I have a theory. Football is the ballet of the masses.
author: Diego Maradona

quote: Football is a simple game. It's just that the playing of it is hard.
author: Johan Cruyff

quote: The fans are the most important part of the club. Without them, we have nothing.
author: Alex Ferguson

quote: Football is the most popular sport in the world because it is the only sport where anything is possible.
author: Pep Guardiola

quote: Never say never because limits, like fears, are often just illusions.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: If my mind can conceive it and my heart can believe it - then I can achieve it.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: You'll never know what you're capable of until you take that first step and just go for it.
author: Natasha Hastings

quote: There may be people that have more talent than you, but there's no excuse for anyone to work harder than you.
author: Derek Jeter

quote: I really think a champion is defined not by their wins, but how they can recover when they fall.
author: Serena Williams

quote: It's not pressure unless you are not prepared.
author: Colin Kaepernick

quote: We don't want to tell our dreams, we want to show them.
author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quote: If you go around being afraid, you're never going to enjoy life. You have only one chance, so you've got to have fun.
author: Lindsey Vonn

quote: But effort? Nobody can judge that because effort is between you and you.
author: Ray Lewis

quote: As athletes, we have ups and downs. Unfortunately, you can't pick the days they come on.
author: Deena Kastor

quote: The most important thing is to try and inspire people so that they can be great in whatever they want to do.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: Nothing can stop you and nothing can define you.
author: Adeel Alam

quote: The wall is your mind playing tricks on you. You just need to say, 'One more step, I can do this. I have more in me.' You'll be so proud of yourself once you push past your threshold.
author: Kerry Walsh

quote: Cricket is not gender biased. It isn't that men's cricket is different and women's a different one.
author: Mithali Raj

quote: Adjusting to life without cricket hasn't been very tough.
author: Inzamam-ul-Haq

quote: Spirit of cricket is not about just the guidelines provided.
author: MS Dhoni

quote: In America, we give hurricanes a name. If they ever call one Lionel Messi, you'd better evacuate.
author: Ray Hudson

quote: If you take away the result, I'm one happy man. To go through what I've been through, being back is a wonderful feeling.
author: Christian Eriksen

quote: This is crazy. I didn't know that I was world champion, there was a lot of confusion, but I thought it was quite funny.
author: Max Verstappen

quote: If anyone says I am better than Roger, then he doesn't know anything about tennis.
author: Rafael Nadal

quote: Lionel Messi has shaken hands with paradise.
author: Peter Drury

quote: There’s no way around hard work. Embrace it. You have to put in the hours because there is always something you can improve on
author: Roger Federer

quote: It’s simply unbelievable. I knew that God was going to give me the Cup, I was sure — it was a big joy for us. I had this big dream for a long time, I wanted to close my career with the World Cup. I can’t ask for more than this.
author: Lionel Messi

quote: Champions aren’t made in gyms. Champions are made from something they have deep inside of them; a desire, a dream, a vision.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Dreams are free. Goals have a cost. While you can daydream for free, goals don’t come without a price. Time, Effort, Sacrifice, and Sweat. How will you pay for your goals?
author: Usain Bolt

quote: I got more bruises, grass-burns, and cuts in practice than in match play.
author: Jonty Rhodes

quote: Enjoy the game & Chase your dreams. Dreams do come true.
author: Sachin Tendulkar

quote: Cricket is a game of glorious uncertainties.
author: Sir Don Bradman

quote: You don't play for revenge. You play for respect and pride.
author: Sunil Gavaskar

quote: Cricket is a team game, and individual brilliance can only take you so far.
author: Kapil Dev

quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
author: MS Dhoni

quote: In cricket, as in life, you miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Virender Sehwag

quote: Cricket is a game that requires mental strength, skill, and determination.
author: Rahul Dravid

quote: I play cricket because I love it. It's my passion.
author: Sachin Tendulkar

quote: Cricket is my life, everything else is just a hobby.
author: Virender Sehwag

quote: When you play for the Indian cricket team, the jersey doesn't just represent you, it represents the dreams of a billion people.
author: Virat Kohli

quote: In cricket, as in life, you need to have a game plan and execute it with determination.
author: Rahul Dravid

quote: Cricket is not just a sport, it's a way of life in India.
author: Sourav Ganguly

quote: I believe in giving my 100% on the field, because that's the only way I know how to play cricket.
author: Anil Kumble

quote: Cricket has taught me more about life than anything else. It has taught me discipline, perseverance, and the importance of teamwork.
author: Mahendra Singh Dhoni

quote: Cricket is a gentleman's game, and it's our responsibility as cricketers to uphold the spirit of the game.
author: Kapil Dev

quote: In cricket, as in any other profession, hard work, dedication, and determination are the keys to success.
author: Yuvraj Singh
